official_title: A bill to extend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945, as amended.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to extend, until September 30, 1978, the operation of the Export-Import Bank of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945, as amended.
